overview:
Stephen Doogan - Director of Business Development

Internet/technology focused healthcare professional, experienced in dealing with pharma, biotech, clinicians and academia.

Expertise in using unbiased patient commentary as a reference point for clinical research and marketing strategy. Aim is to deliver greater efficacy and targeting in drug development through the use of transformational technology.

Previous experience includes computational pharmacovigilance for Hitachi, information architecture for LloydsTSB, London and clinical research for Kitasato Medical University, Tokyo. Graduated with honors in Japanese and Asia Pacific Studies from the University of Leeds, England.
